responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "81B9D396448D88D4E5667CBE6DA865EF", "Our caravan from Samia\'s Hope ran into trouble on the way to Oakenbane Keep. We were searching for ancient relics, but the journey was tough with limited resources and rough terrain. Despite the setbacks, we\'re still committed to uncovering lost arcane technologies and harnessing the Essence. Thankfully, we have support from the Court of Cloaks and the Striders. Reconnecting with the past and the gods keeps us going, no matter the challenges we face.")
name: DD_CSQ_0071_Farzaan_11
